body.name: Milliard Memory Foam Seat Cushion Chair Pad 18 x 16 x 3in. with Washable Cover, for Relief and Comfort
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Milliard Memory Foam Cushion is designed to provide therapeutic comfort for sitting, even for prolonged periods of time. Cushion helps maintain proper posture and provide stability while seated.

Memory foam is known for therapeutic qualities and comfortable support. It's designed to conform perfectly to the contours of your body for maximum comfort and support. Our premium memory foam supersedes all with superior high density construction for longer lasting product.

The Milliard cushion is ventilated for air flow to help regulate temperature for maximum support and comfort. The memory foam relieves discomfort, aches, and fatigue for one and all. Enjoy optimal comfort while sitting for extended periods of time.
Includes breathable mesh, cover that zips off easily for machine washing. Cushion measures 18in.x16in.x3in..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great consistancy in cushion effect and effectiveness. I'm actually very surprised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for Backseat Riders
reviews.reviewText: I got this for times when I am a backseat passenger on trips and it really makes for a more comfortable ride, especially on rough roads. It fits nicely into the car seat and stays in place. I'm glad I got it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great added support for office chair
reviews.reviewText: It was hard to find a decently priced cushion that didn't have the tailbone cutout (I had tried that type previously and it wasn't for me). I really like this cushion - it's a good thickness and decent size. It does slightly slope towards the front of the chair, which I realized after a few weeks when I couldn't figure out why I kept sliding off the chair. I reversed the cushion and it solved the issue. It does appear to be memory foam, which means it's a bit firm when you initially sit down (and I was at first wondering if I would be sending it back), but it provides great support and comfort. I rated it 4 stars because of the sloping style and that I'd like it to be a few inches wider.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The cushions are comfortable and sized perfectly for our dining room chairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Short life span
reviews.reviewText: Ordered November 27, 2023 - Dead by January 14, 2024. After it had re-expanded the cushion was never 3 inches deep as described. By the end of the day is is about 3/4" inches thick and by morning about 1-1/4". I purchased this height as well as comfort. It failed on height but was pretty comfortable. I won't be buying this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sure helped my elderly parents
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 2 of these cushions for my elderly parents. They spend most of their time in their recliners and they complain that their bottoms get sore from sitting long periods. After reading the reviews I decided to order this cushion for each of them. Both are very happy with them. Haven't had them long enough to report how they will hold up but visually the quality seems good. The price was affordable for the quality. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It serves its purpose
reviews.reviewText: The pad is as advertised, just a little too hard for me, but I can live with it.
I wasn't sure if this would make a difference but I love it. My back doesn't get sore when I sit for longer periods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought an office chair in the pandemic, and although it's structurally pretty solid, the seat padding was completely flattened after about a year of eight hour days. So, I bought one of these, thinking that if it lasted a few months, I'd be happy with it.That was summer 2021. I just realised I've had this thing for two and a half years, and it's still in almost mint condition - the cover is still perfect, and the padding just pops back up, even though it's been in extended daily use for that entire period. It's honestly lasted ten times as long as I was expecting, and shows no obvious signs of deterioration.I probably should have reviewed it sooner, but it's always difficult with something like this as you don't know how well it will last - well, now I know, and I have to give it five stars. I'd buy another one in a heartbeat... but I obviously don't need to.
Bonnes dimensions (45 x 40 cm). Bonne épaisseur. Une fois calé dedans, on est très bien.Un peu cher, mais je suis content de cet achat.
Bra stoppning, skön att sitta på.Håller formen Bra.Passformen till bilsittsen kan vara bättre. För övrigt bra sittdyna till priset.
pour rehausser et bonne assise sur mon siege de bureau mais s'affaisse très vite de ses7cm d'épaisseur a 2cm il faut se lever attendre pour qu'il reprenne sa forme je regrette de l'avoir acheté
